# R/Pharma

### R/Pharma is a scientifically & industry oriented, collegial online conference focused on the use of R in the development of pharmaceuticals, with breakout in-person and APAC satellite events.

Our mission:

- Promote the use of open source, and collaboration between companies 
- Put on fantastic, vendor free, community events like R/Pharma, R/Pharma APAC and R/Pharma Summit
- Encourage seminars, dicussion and facilitate collaboration between companies

## R/Pharma

The first conference took place in 2018, as an in-person event hosted by Harvard. During Covid-19, the 
conference moved to be online, and grew in participation to more than 1,500 data scientists from the 
pharma world with a passion for using R.

The conference is free to attend, and all hosting costs are met by contributions by 
Pharma companies.

## R/Pharma Summit

Posit and R/Pharma are excited to announce that the R/Pharma Roundtable Summit is returning for posit::conf(2025). Last year, representatives from ~40 companies met in-person to discuss some of the most pressing topics pharma is tackling to bring data science to late stage development. The in-person summit focuses on the future of drug development using open source and tailored for program leaders and people leading Open Source initiatives. A summary of prior years is here: [Summit page](/docs/summit). 

During the 2025 R/Pharma Summit, facilitators will foster in-person discussions and conversations about key items (reproducibility, interactivity, submissions, scalability, etc.) with industry leaders about open-source tools for next-generation submissions.The 2024 advisory board, shaping the agenda and planned actions for the event, spans >10 pharma companies, as well as CROs and academic research centers.
